channel.title: This Week in Tech (MP3)
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/
channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital tech. 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award winner.
channel.itunes:summary: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital technology. Winner of the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award for best overall podcast and Best Technology Podcast. Released every Sunday by midnight Pacific.
channel.description: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital technology. Winner of the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award for best overall podcast and Best Technology Podcast. Released every Sunday by midnight Pacific.
channel.itunes:keywords: TWiT, TechTV, Leo Laporte, Kevin Rose, Patrick Norton, John C. Dvorak

item.title: TWiT 447: Anarchy Wins
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.author: leo@twit.tv (Leo Laporte)
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, Alex Lindsay, Larry Magid, and Farhad Manjoo

Nokia Android phones, Apple’s politics, buying “likes,” Uber secrets, and more.

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/twit.

For additional show notes, visit the wiki page for this episode.

Bandwidth for This Week in Tech is provided by Cachefly.

Running time: 1:43:11
